Smoothies  & Juices

Smoothie demo Designed for you

Kiwi Kiss

(kiwi + pineapple + Green Grapes)

This delightful blend features the exotic tang of kiwi, the sweet juiciness of pineapple, and the crisp bite of green grapes. Each sip is a journey to paradise, offering a refreshing escape from the ordinary.

Chicoo Chocoo

(Chicoo + Cacao Powder + Cashew + banana + Dates + Milk of Choice)

Your delightfully Chocolate flavour get a healthy twist in our chicoo chocoo smoothie bowl where creamy chicoo pairs perfectly with unsweetened cacao powder, creating a decadent base enriched with antioxidants and natural sweetness. Topped with luscious banana slices, crunchy cashews, and sweet dates, each spoonful is a symphony of flavors and textures. Finished with a drizzle of your choice of milk, this nourishing bowl is the ultimate treat for both your taste buds and your well-being.

Tropical Twist

(Pineapple + Orange + Ice + Mint)

Dive into a refreshing blend of juicy pineapple, tangy orange, and crisp mint, all served over a bed of ice for the ultimate cool-down experience. This vibrant concoction is like a vacation in a glass.

Grape Escape

(Green grapes, Black Grapes, Ice)

Embark on a summer-scape with our signature cooler called the "Grape Escape." So come dive into a refreshing blend of crisp green grapes and luscious black grapes, served over ice to deliver a burst of coolness with every sip. Embark on a journey of grape-infused delight and let this invigorating concoction transport you to a world of pure refreshment.

Mango Smurf

(Mango, Banana, Blue Spirulina, Milk)

Get lost in the enchanting world of our seasonal delight, the "Mango Smurf" blue smoothie bowl. Crafted with ripe mangoes, creamy bananas, and a touch of superfood blue spirulina, all blended to perfection with your choice of milk. Indulge in the vibrant hues and tropical flavors of this magical creation, guaranteed to transport your taste buds to blue skies and sunny shores.

Blueberry Burst

(Blueberry + Banana + Apple + blue spirulina )

Savor the goodness of nature with our "Blueberry Burst" smoothie, crafted with succulent blueberries, ripe bananas, crisp apples, and a boost of superfood blue spirulina. This vibrant blue blend not only tantalizes your taste buds but also nourishes your body with antioxidants and essential nutrients.

About Us

Nù-tree's journey began with a late-night realization during the COVID-19 shutdown about deceptive health claims by big brands, prompting the creation of a healthy alternative. Recognizing the lack of guilt-free options, Nù-tree was born as India's first QSR cafe, promoting nutritious drinks made from seasonal fruits, vegetables, nuts, and superfoods like spirulina and matcha. With over 50% of Indians lacking a balanced diet, Nù-tree aims to revolutionize lifestyles by offering novel, wholesome alternatives and sourcing fruits globally.
